channel.title: Crezion [718/728] -
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZoqqZaA.gif[/img] [FONT=Courier New] [IMG]http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/3/3f/House_icon.png[/img][url=http://crezion.com/]Website[/url] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/keaq9g.png[/img][url=http://crezion.com/forum/]Community[/url] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/j6qro3.png[/img][url=http://crezion.com/highscores]Highscores[/url] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/zvq3vb.png[/img][url=http://crezion.com/vote]Voting[/url] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2ymc5lv.png[/img] [url=http://Crezion.com/Crezion.jar]Download[/url] [/FONT] [/CENTER]
[B][U]About Crezion[/U][/B] Crezion is a 718 loading 728 RuneScape Private Server aimed at entertainment made by Crezion's Development Team for players & focusing on player satiscation with daily updates and a large amount of content, which is already available. Crezion aims to capture a flawless gameplay experience for our players with features that the community wants rather than what the development team.
[B][U]Crezion's Features[/U][/B]
[ul][*][B]Play Style [/B]- Ironman & Regular. [*][B]EXP Modes[/B] - Four different experience modes. [*][B]Construction[/B] - Most rooms are build able (saving furniture & room creation), supports a functioning build mode, multiple floors including dungeons, supports toggling, guests & kicking. [*][B]Clan System[/B] - Creating, joining, leaving, rank giver, color changing & motto’s, chatting & guests. [*][B]Toolbelt System[/B] - Supporting all kind of Tool, using them to do skills. [*][B]Grand Exchange[/B] - Fully functioning player-based grand exchange including history & the stats/requirements of the items is being shown [*][B]Hunger Game[/B] - It takes place in a small area where you have to try to kill each other. [*][B]MoneyPouch[/B] - Working adding & withdrawing, supporting stores. [*][B]Hunter[/B] - Supporting birdsnares (crimson swifts, tropical wagtail, wimpy birds, the golden warbler, copper longtails) & box snares (nearly for all kind, such as; grenwalls, chinchompas, geckos, racoons etc), also including falconry. [*][B]Jewellery System[/B]- Every type of jewellery are craftable also moulds for every form of jewellery can be used. [*][B]Slayer System[/B] - Supporting cooperative slayer, slayer masters which requires their own requirements, working enchanted & ring of slayer. [*][B]Farming System [/B]- Mostly all kind of patches are supported & use of all farming related tools. [*][B]Shortcuts[/B] - Supporting worldwide shortcuts (requires different levels of agility). [*][B]Magic Skill [/B]- Supporting all kind of spell books, transportation, alchemy (profit) & enchanting. [*][B]Reqs & Achievements[/B] - There are bunch of requirements to obtain Completionist. [*][B]Summoning[/B] - Pouch & Scroll Creation, including most familiars. [*][B]Lodestone Network[/B] - Activation, animation & short cutscene. [*][B]Clue Scrolls[/B] - Over 20 clues, including interface & epic rewards. [*][B]Duel Arena & Anywhere[/B] - You're allowed to send send a challenge anywhere. Perfected system including, friendly & stake duels. [*][B]Pest Control[/B] - Landers, player requirements, lobby, joining, timer & rewards interface.[/ul]
[IMG]http://i65.tinypic.com/2s7votl.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i64.tinypic.com/2lm1k0k.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i63.tinypic.com/15ycg3c.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i67.tinypic.com/ao01sk.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i68.tinypic.com/oshc00.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i67.tinypic.com/e71c85.jpg[/img]
[SPOILER=Images] [IMG]http://i67.tinypic.com/54ccba.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i68.tinypic.com/2ymga2w.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i64.tinypic.com/2v8sruq.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i68.tinypic.com/33f49yx.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i67.tinypic.com/2nhg6t5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i68.tinypic.com/20zzodu.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i63.tinypic.com/2hhkwgl.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i67.tinypic.com/2l8f7mh.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i66.tinypic.com/lcyt2.jpg[/img][/SPOILER]

item.description:
@entrinthy_rs wrote:

[CENTER]

ZoqqZaA.gif728×90

[FONT=Courier New]
Website Community Highscores Voting Download [/FONT]
[/CENTER]

About Crezion
Crezion is a 718 loading 728 RuneScape Private Server aimed at entertainment made by Crezion’s Development Team
for players & focusing on player satiscation with daily updates and a large amount of content, which is already available.
Crezion aims to capture a flawless gameplay experience for our players with features
that the community wants rather than what the development team.

Crezion’s Features

[ul][]Play Style - Ironman & Regular.
[]EXP Modes - Four different experience modes.
[]Construction - Most rooms are build able (saving furniture & room creation), supports a functioning build mode, multiple floors including dungeons, supports toggling, guests & kicking.
[]Clan System - Creating, joining, leaving, rank giver, color changing & motto’s, chatting & guests.
[]Toolbelt System - Supporting all kind of Tool, using them to do skills.
[]Grand Exchange - Fully functioning player-based grand exchange including history & the stats/requirements of the items is being shown
[]Hunger Game - It takes place in a small area where you have to try to kill each other.
[]MoneyPouch - Working adding & withdrawing, supporting stores.
[]Hunter - Supporting birdsnares (crimson swifts, tropical wagtail, wimpy birds, the golden warbler, copper longtails) & box snares (nearly for all kind, such as; grenwalls, chinchompas, geckos, racoons etc), also including falconry.
[]Jewellery System- Every type of jewellery are craftable also moulds for every form of jewellery can be used.
[]Slayer System - Supporting cooperative slayer, slayer masters which requires their own requirements, working enchanted & ring of slayer.
[]Farming System - Mostly all kind of patches are supported & use of all farming related tools.
[]Shortcuts - Supporting worldwide shortcuts (requires different levels of agility).
[]Magic Skill - Supporting all kind of spell books, transportation, alchemy (profit) & enchanting.
[]Reqs & Achievements - There are bunch of requirements to obtain Completionist.
[]Summoning - Pouch & Scroll Creation, including most familiars.
[]Lodestone Network - Activation, animation & short cutscene.
[]Clue Scrolls - Over 20 clues, including interface & epic rewards.
[]Duel Arena & Anywhere - You’re allowed to send send a challenge anywhere. Perfected system including, friendly & stake duels.
[]Pest Control - Landers, player requirements, lobby, joining, timer & rewards interface.[/ul]
